content.raw: Hi Dhruv, thanks for getting in touch and suggesting this improvement.  Just to be sure, are you referring to the layouts section in the first tutorial notebook, [here](https://dedalus-project.readthedocs.io/en/latest/notebooks/dedalus_tutorial_bases_domains.html)?  Section 5 of the methods paper \([here](https://arxiv.org/abs/1905.10388)\) discusses the layout system pretty thoroughly.  Figure 5 in particular may be useful to look at – maybe adding that to the tutorial notebook would help?
